trends: There have been 18 other sightings in Bangor
There were no other sightings in Bangor on or around April 17th 2008
divs: Sighting Detailsi was out on by back porch letting the dog out it was about 9 at night and i saw a flash out of the corner of my eye. I thought that it was a shooting start and then it moved back the opposite direction and stopped in a hover . I called to my mom and it shot back the other way and right back to a hover . I would say that it was at least 5 to 10 miles away . The thing that was most noticeable was the flashing and pulsing of VERY intense ever changing lights . When it was close to us we could see the front end was round but the lights were the weird thing . They would go from red to maroon to blue and yellow they were like the intensity of lightning I would guess . We watched it between calling everyone i knew for almost 50 minutes. It would dart back and forth but only in short jumps not like when i first saw it . I even called 911 and asked if anyone had reported anything . They said no but that they would call the FAA and let me know if they said anything and they never did call back . I am not crazy i wouldnt have believeed it if i hadnt seen it .Finally we went in because it was getting cold and i looked again and it was gone when i peeked back out the door . I tried to take pictures , but i couldnt get the stupid flash to stop working on the camera , and to be honest i was to wound up to think straight . I am not crazy and i was a skeptic , but what we saw was not like anything like anything man made I have ever seen
Summary: round object with many very very bright pulsating lights that changed colors aat random
